text: Stephen Edward Broden (born April 11, 1952) is an American businessman, pastor, political activist, broadcaster, and former professor. He is the Constitution Party's candidate for Vice President of the United States in the 2024 presidential election. In 2010, he was the Republican candidate for for the United States House of Representatives.Broden for Congress Official Site He lost the election to Democratic Representative Eddie Bernice Johnson. In April 2024, Broden was picked as Randall Terry's vice presidential running mate for the Constitution Party's ticket. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Politicians from Texas Category:American political activists Category:American political commentators Category:Academics from Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Constitution Party (United States) politicians Category:2024 United States vice-presidential candidates Category:American Christians Category:American politicians
